sentences.en: ...a gigantic pink marble bath.
sentences.cn: …一个巨大的粉红色大理石浴缸。

sentences.en: a gigantic pink marble bath
sentences.cn: 一个巨大的粉红色大理石浴缸

sentences.en: After a week of camping, I really needed a bath.
sentences.cn: 我露营了一个星期，实在得洗个澡了。

sentences.en: After lunch she decided on impulse to take a bath.
sentences.cn: 午饭后她突然兴起，决定洗个澡。

sentences.en: All 300 elegantly furnished rooms have private bath.
sentences.cn: 300个布置讲究的房间全都配有独立浴室。

sentences.en: Don't feel you have to bath your child every day.
sentences.cn: 不用每天给孩子洗澡。

sentences.en: He came fully awake to hear the bath running.
sentences.cn: 他完全清醒了，听见浴缸里的水在流。

sentences.en: He sluiced the bath and filled it.
sentences.cn: 他冲洗了浴缸，然后放满了一缸水。

sentences.en: He took a bath and shaved before dinner.
sentences.cn: 晚餐前他洗了澡，刮了脸。

sentences.en: I sang in the bath and drove my parents up the wall.
sentences.cn: 我在浴室里唱歌，我父母快受不了了。

sentences.en: I threw off my clothing quickly and ran a warm bath.
sentences.cn: 我很快脱了衣服，放上洗澡的热水。

sentences.en: I would love a hot bath and clean clothes.
sentences.cn: 要是能洗个热水澡、换身干净的衣服就太好了。

sentences.en: I’ll bath the children.
sentences.cn: 我要给孩子们洗澡了。

sentences.en: I’ll give the children their bath (=  wash them in a bath  ) .
sentences.cn: 我要给孩子们洗澡了。

sentences.en: She undressed the child before putting her in the tin bath.
sentences.cn: 她给孩子脱下衣服，然后把她放进锡铁澡盆里。

sentences.en: The Mud Bath is particularly recommended for relieving tension and stiff muscles.
sentences.cn: 特别推荐想要放松情绪、缓解肌肉酸痛的人泡泥浆浴。

sentences.en: the referee awarded a penalty and ordered an early bath for Sansome.
sentences.cn: 裁判处罚了桑塞姆并令他提前退场。

sentences.en: The three children all bath in the same bath water.
sentences.cn: 这三个小孩用同一盆水洗澡。

sentences.en: The water was slightly cooler than a child's bath.
sentences.cn: 这水比小孩的洗澡水稍微凉一些。

sentences.en: They would flap bath towels from their balconies as they chatted.
sentences.cn: 他们聊天时会在阳台上抖搂浴巾。

sentences.en: Try a hot bath with some relaxing bath oil.
sentences.cn: 用舒缓沐浴油洗个热水澡吧。
